college.name: Excellence Institute of Technology
college.motto: Excellence in Education, Innovation in Practice
college.vision: To be a leading institution fostering innovation, research, and holistic development.
college.mission: To provide world-class education that empowers students with knowledge, skills, and values needed to excel in their chosen careers and contribute meaningfully to society.
college.description: Excellence Institute of Technology has been a pioneer in technical education for over two decades. Founded with the vision of creating tomorrow's innovators, our institute has consistently maintained its position as a leading educational institution.
college.philosophy: We believe in nurturing not just academic excellence but also the overall personality development of our students through various cultural, technical, and sports activities.

coreValues.title: Excellence
coreValues.description: Striving for the highest standards in everything we do

coreValues.title: Inclusivity
coreValues.description: Creating an environment where everyone feels valued

events.name: TechFest
events.description: Our flagship technical festival featuring hackathons, coding competitions, project exhibitions, and tech talks by industry experts.

events.name: Innovation Lab
events.description: Showcasing groundbreaking student research and development projects across various engineering disciplines.

events.name: Robotics Championship
events.description: Inter-college robotics competition challenging students to build autonomous and remote-controlled robots.

events.name: Cultural Extravaganza
events.description: A vibrant celebration of arts, music, dance, and literature featuring performances by talented students from all departments.

events.name: Annual Day
events.description: The grandest celebration of the year with cultural performances, awards ceremonies, and recognition of achievements.

events.name: Literary Fest
events.description: Poetry recitations, drama competitions, and creative writing contests showcasing our students' artistic talents.

events.name: Inter-Departmental Championships
events.description: Competitions in cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, badminton, and athletics.

events.name: Annual Sports Meet
events.description: A week-long celebration of sportsmanship and athletic excellence with various indoor and outdoor games.

events.name: Fitness Challenges
events.description: Promoting health and wellness through marathon runs, gym competitions, and fitness awareness programs.

events.name: Research Symposium
events.description: Presenting cutting-edge research work by faculty and students in various engineering and science disciplines.

events.name: Industry Connect
events.description: Career fairs, placement drives, and networking sessions with leading companies and startups.

events.name: Academic Excellence Awards
events.description: Recognizing outstanding academic achievements, research contributions, and innovative projects.

organizingBodies.name: Student Council
organizingBodies.description: Overall event coordination and student representation

organizingBodies.name: Cultural Committee
organizingBodies.description: Organizing cultural events, art exhibitions, and performances

organizingBodies.name: Technical Society
organizingBodies.description: Managing technical festivals, workshops, and competitions

organizingBodies.name: Sports Committee
organizingBodies.description: Coordinating sports events and fitness activities

timeline.description: Inter-college robotics competition with autonomous robots
Kickoff of our flagship technical festival
Culmination of technical competitions and exhibitions
Vibrant celebration of arts, dance, and music
Grand celebration with awards and cultural programs
